Description: Dark-red pottery ostracon, from the body of a vessel, interior slightly grooved and covered with traces of a black deposit, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of three lines of thick black-painted demotic text, now much faded.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389790) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389790)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
